attributes.action: Nicholas R Skellett should be given abosulte and permanent control of the governments home and foreign office.  He should be paid handsomly for this service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By signing this petition you show your distaste for the manner in which this corrupt governemet conducts itself both at home and abroad, and request that Nicholas R Skellett be given totalitarian control of all government policy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
